verbs.description: Minutes after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: used] [ARG1: his Memorial Day] [ARG2: to praise himself on Twitter] , former President Barack Obama once again stepped up to fill the leadership vacuum by tweeting a moving tribute to fallen soldiers .
